vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.6.17;
son of: Gershon (H1648);
brother of: Shimei (H8096);
father of: Jahath (H3189H), Ladan (H3936I), Shimei (H8096W); also called Jahath at 1Ch.6.43; Ladan (KJV: Laadan) at 1Ch.23.7,9; 26.21;
§ Libni = "white"
the eldest son of Gershon and grandson of Levi
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Guersón; tribu de Leví; (b)   hijo de Mahli; descendiente de Merarí; tribu de Leví; (c)   descendiente de Libní; tribu de Leví
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
立尼 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "白色"
利未的孫子, 革順的長子
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
立尼 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "白色"
利未的孙子, 革顺的长子

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.29;
son of: Mahli (H4249);
brother of: Eleazar (H0499J) and Kish (H7027H);
father of: Shimei (H8096M)
§ Libni = "white"
the eldest son of Gershon and grandson of Levi
